Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a mod that allows to crew seats.

I found one, but it's download link isn't working. (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77066-Seat-Fixer-Assign-Crew-to-Command-Seats-in-VAB-SPH!-Launch-Kerbals-on-an-SRB!)
The ability to add crew to command chairs before launch? Then it would be so useful, I wouldnt use any other control anymore!

I'm looking for a mod that allows to crew seats.

I found one, but it's download link isn't working. (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77066-Seat-Fixer-Assign-Crew-to-Command-Seats-in-VAB-SPH!-Launch-Kerbals-on-an-SRB!)

Anyone that could help??
